messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2388
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/17/2002 8:58:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... NO! NO! NO! NO! NO! Look up the law! I know DSS. This is NOT true. YOU must KNOW the law!
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/17/2002 8:58:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> In SC they have this maze of laws and regulations set up to take away a
> parents rights to raise and educate their children. And if you are poor or
> disabled or in anyway less than "perfect" parents (I am both poor and
> disabled) they will come and take your kids and give them to someone who
> will turn them into non feeling zombies.
>
>

NO! NO! NO! NO! NO!

Look up the law! I know DSS. This is NOT true. YOU must KNOW the law! YOU're
responsible for knowing your rights! YOU!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
